EmailTemplate.description: Auto-notification sent to CCT when a summer YP applicant decides to do Autumn
EmailTemplate.name: YP to be moved to Autumn
EmailTemplate.subject: Autumn applicant in {!Contact.School_s_cluster__c} - confirmed by Schools Coordinator
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
Re a YP applicant in {!Contact.School_s_cluster__c}:
Please look at {!Contact.Name}'s record. They have agreed with the Schools Coordinator to go on an Autumn wave. Please urgently reallocate them based on this information. Click on this link to see the record: {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a Schools Coordinator receives information that a YP wants to go on an Autumn wave
